mapper.sql: parcel_code, org_id, bills_code, receive_unit, carrier_unit, state, update_date, send_date, delivery_way, trantransportation_expenses, package_number, package_weight, package_volume, volume_weight, receive_name, receive_phone, receive_post, receive_address, note, founders, founder_date, modefieds, modefied_date, out_date, send_unit, receive_date, type,fitting_position_id
mapper.select: SELECT t.receive_unit, v.name receive_unit1, t.send_unit, o.org_manager, o.org_reference, o.org_post_code, o.org_address, o.org_create_id, o.org_update_id FROM hx_parcel_delivery t JOIN hx_organization o on t.org_id= o.org_code LEFT JOIN hx_organization_unload v on v.id is NOT NULL and v.id=t.receive_unit LEFT JOIN v_code v1 on v1.code_id='ybzt' and v1.code_key = t.state where t.receive_unit=#{receive_unit,jdbcType="VARCHAR"}
select fitting_pid from hx_organization where org_code=#{orgId};
SELECT lpad(count(*) + 1, 4, '0') FROM hx_parcel_delivery WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(founder_date, 'm-%d-%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), 'm-%d-%Y')

SELECT hx_material_detail.fitting_code, c.code_value AS type, hx_material_manage.list_number, hx_material_manage. COMMENT, hx_material_manage.update_time, hx_material_detail.audit_count, hx_material_manage.send_number, hx_fitting_detail.fitting_name, hx_fitting_detail.spec FROM hx_material_manage INNER JOIN hx_material_detail ON hx_material_manage.list_number = hx_material_detail.list_number AND hx_material_manage.receive_company = #{param.receiveUnit} and hx_material_manage.STATUS = 'S7' AND hx_material_manage.list_number IN ( ${param.list} ) INNER JOIN hx_fitting_detail ON hx_material_detail.fitting_code = hx_fitting_detail.fitting_code INNER JOIN v_code c ON c.code_id = 'fitting_type' AND c.code_key = hx_material_manage.type

SELECT t.parcel_code, t.bills_code, v.name receive_unit, v3.name send_unit, t.send_date, t.delivery_way, t.receive_date, t.carrier_unit, t.trantransportation_expenses, t.package_number, t.package_weight, t.package_volume, t.volume_weight, v1.code_value state, t.note, t.founder_date, t.modefied_date, v5.user_name modefieds, v4.user_name founders, t.receive_name, t.receive_post, t.receive_address, t.receive_phone FROM hx_parcel_delivery t INNER JOIN hx_organization_unload v ON v.id IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN hx_organization_unload v3 ON v3.id IS NOT NULL AND v.id = t.receive_unit AND v3.id = t.send_unit LEFT JOIN v_code v1 ON v1.code_id = 'ybzt' AND v1.code_key = t.state LEFT JOIN hx_user_unload v4 on v4.user_login_name = t.founders LEFT JOIN hx_user_unload v5 on v5.user_login_name = t.modefieds where t.parcel_code=#{parcelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t.parcel_code, t.bills_code, v.name receive_unit, v3.name send_unit, t.send_date, t.delivery_way, t.receive_date, t.carrier_unit, t.trantransportation_expenses, t.package_number, t.package_weight, t.package_volume, t.volume_weight, v1.code_value state, t.note, t.founder_date, t.modefied_date, v5.user_name modefieds, v4.user_name founders, t.receive_name, t.receive_post, t.receive_address, t.receive_phone FROM hx_parcel_delivery t INNER JOIN hx_organization_unload v ON v.id IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN hx_organization_unload v3 ON v3.id IS NOT NULL AND v.id = t.receive_unit AND v3.id = t.send_unit LEFT JOIN v_code v1 ON v1.code_id = 'ybzt' AND v1.code_key = t.state LEFT JOIN hx_user_unload v4 on v4.user_login_name = t.founders LEFT JOIN hx_user_unload v5 on v5.user_login_name = t.modefieds where t.parcel_code=#{parcelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.parcel_code,t.bills_code,t.carrier_unit,t.send_unit,t.update_date, t.receive_unit, v.name receive_unit1,t.state, v1.code_value state1 from hx_parcel_delivery t LEFT JOIN hx_organization_unload v on v.id is not NULL and v.id = t.receive_unit LEFT JOIN v_code v1 on v1.code_id='ybzt' and v1.code_key = t.state where 1=1
mapper.update: update hx_parcel_delivery set bills_code = #{billsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_unit = #{receiveUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_unit = #{sendUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_date = #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delivery_way = #{deliveryWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_date = #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carrier_unit = #{carrierUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trantransportation_expenses = #{trantransportationExpenses,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_weight = #{packageWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_number = #{packageNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volume_weight = #{volumeWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_name = #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_phone = #{receivePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_post = #{receivePost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_address = #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modefieds=#{modefieds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modefied_date = #{modefiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, package_volume = #{packageVolume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fitting_position_id = #{fittingPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where parcel_code =#{parcelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select p.parcel_code, p.bills_code, p.receive_unit, v.name receive_unit1 , p.send_unit, p.send_date, p.delivery_way, p.receive_date, p.carrier_unit, p.trantransportation_expenses, p.package_number, p.package_volume, p.package_weight, p.volume_weight, p.state, v1.code_value state1, p.note, p.founder_date, p.modefied_date from hx_parcel_delivery p LEFT JOIN hx_organization_unload v on v.id is not NULL and v.id = p.receive_unit LEFT JOIN v_code v1 ON v1.code_id = 'ybzt' and v1.code_key = p.state where 1=1 and p.org_id =#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select p.parcel_code, p.bills_code, v.name receive_unit , p.send_unit, p.send_date, p.delivery_way, p.receive_date, p.carrier_unit, p.trantransportation_expenses, p.package_number, p.package_volume, p.package_weight, p.volume_weight, v1.code_value state, p.note, p.founder_date, p.modefied_date from hx_parcel_delivery p LEFT JOIN hx_organization_unload v on v.id is not NULL and v.id = p.receive_unit LEFT JOIN v_code v1 ON v1.code_id = 'ybzt' and v1.code_key = p.state where 1=1 and p.parcel_code =#{parcelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT m.list_number, hx_fitting_detail.fitting_name, hx_fitting_detail.spec, d.fitting_code, m.send_number, d.audit_count, s.code_value as type FROM hx_material_detail AS d INNER JOIN hx_material_manage AS m ON m.list_number = d.list_number INNER JOIN hx_fitting_detail ON d.fitting_code = hx_fitting_detail.fitting_code, hx_code AS c INNER JOIN hx_code_setting AS s ON c.code_id = s.code_id WHERE m.list_number IN ( SELECT p.list_number FROM hx_parcel_material AS p WHERE p.parcel_code=#{parcelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND s.code_id = 'fitting_type' AND s.code_key = m.type

SELECT m.list_number, hx_fitting_detail.fitting_name, hx_fitting_detail.spec, d.fitting_code, m.send_number, d.audit_count, s.code_value as type FROM hx_material_detail AS d INNER JOIN hx_material_manage AS m ON m.list_number = d.list_number INNER JOIN hx_fitting_detail ON d.fitting_code = hx_fitting_detail.fitting_code, hx_code AS c INNER JOIN hx_code_setting AS s ON c.code_id = s.code_id WHERE m.list_number IN ( SELECT p.list_number FROM hx_parcel_material AS p WHERE p.parcel_code=#{parcelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND s.code_id = 'fitting_type' AND s.code_key = m.type

SELECT t.parcel_code, t.bills_code, v. NAME receive_unit, v3. NAME send_unit, t.send_date, t.delivery_way, t.receive_date, t.carrier_unit, t.trantransportation_expenses, t.package_number, t.package_weight, t.package_volume, t.volume_weight, v1.code_value state, t.note, t.founder_date, t.modefied_date, v5.user_name modefieds, v4.user_name founders, t.receive_name, t.receive_post, t.receive_address, t.receive_phone, m.list_number, hx_fitting_detail.fitting_name, hx_fitting_detail.spec, d.fitting_code, m.send_number, d.audit_count, s.code_value AS type FROM hx_parcel_delivery t INNER JOIN hx_organization_unload v ON v.id IS NOT NULL INNER JOIN hx_organization_unload v3 ON v3.id IS NOT NULL AND v.id = t.receive_unit AND v3.id = t.send_unit LEFT JOIN v_code v1 ON v1.code_id = 'ybzt' AND v1.code_key = t.state LEFT JOIN hx_user_unload v4 ON v4.user_login_name = t.founders LEFT JOIN hx_user_unload v5 ON v5.user_login_name = t.modefieds, hx_material_detail AS d INNER JOIN hx_material_manage AS m ON m.list_number = d.list_number INNER JOIN hx_fitting_detail ON d.fitting_code = hx_fitting_detail.fitting_code, hx_code AS c INNER JOIN hx_code_setting AS s ON c.code_id = s.code_id WHERE t.parcel_code = #{parcelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.list_number IN ( SELECT p.list_number FROM hx_parcel_material AS p WHERE p.parcel_code = t.parcel_code ) AND s.code_id = 'fitting_type' AND s.code_key = m.type
mapper.update:
update hx_parcel_delivery
fitting_position_id = #{fittingPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bills_code = #{billsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_unit = #{receiveUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carrier_unit = #{carrierUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
send_date = #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delivery_way = #{deliveryWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trantransportation_expenses = #{trantransportationExpenses,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
package_number = #{packageNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
package_weight = #{packageWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
package_volume = #{packageVolume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
volume_weight = #{volumeWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_name = #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_phone = #{receivePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_post = #{receivePost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_address = #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
founders = #{founders,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
founder_date = #{founderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modefieds = #{modefieds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modefied_date = #{modefiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
out_date = #{outDate,jdbcType=DATE},
send_unit = #{sendUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_date = #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where parcel_code = #{parcelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
